extensionDescription.message: Quickly insert and manage your Prompts for AI chat interfaces.

savePromptButton.description: Button text to save an edited prompt.

editButton.description: Button text to edit a prompt.

deleteButton.description: Button text to delete a prompt.

noPrompts.message: No prompts saved yet. Add one above!
